_source.text: (16) The conditions of the Wilderness Road in 1808 were probably not much better than they were in 1803 when Bishop Francis Asbury described it after a journey on the road following a Methodist conference in Madison county......... ........ "Certainly the worst on the whole continent even in the best weather; yet bad as it was there were four or five hundred crossing the rude hills whilst we were...

text: (16) The conditions of the **Wilderness** **Road** in 1808 were probably not much **better** **than** they were in
1803 when Bishop Francis Asbury described it after a journey on the **road** following a Methodist
